purpose: The purpose of this code is to collect system information including internal and external IP addresses, DNS servers, hostname, user info, and package details, then send this data to a Discord webhook for tracking purposes.
anomalies: Uses external IP lookup via ipinfo.io
Sends comprehensive system and package information to a Discord webhook
Writes data to stdout in HTTP response handler
analysis: This code appears to be a telemetry or tracking module that gathers system and package metadata and sends it to a remote Discord webhook. It collects sensitive information such as IP addresses, hostnames, user credentials, and package details. The presence of a hardcoded webhook URL suggests this may be part of a malicious payload or unauthorized tracking mechanism.
conclusion: This code exhibits characteristics of telemetry malware, collecting system information and transmitting it to a remote server without explicit user consent.
